UPDATE BUYER b SET B_RANK = ( SELECT CASE WHEN price < 1000000 THEN '1' WHEN price < 5000000 THEN '2' WHEN price < 10000000 THEN '3' WHEN price >= 10000000 THEN '4' END
FROM ( SELECT NVL(SUM(PAY_PRICE),0) AS price FROM PAYMENT WHERE B_EMAIL = b.B_EMAIL AND PAY_ENDDATE IS NOT NULL ) )
